articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: WTC, ODI WC, U19 WC: Australia's hat-trick of ICC trophy domination over India - Hindustan Times
articles.description: With the 79-run loss at the 2024 U19 World Cup final, India have now incurred a hat-trick of losses against Australia in ICC tournament summit clashes. | Cricket
articles.content: It seemed like deja vu for Indian cricket fans. Only three months back, the Rohit Sharma-led Team India stormed into the 2023 ODI World Cup final on an unbeaten run, sparking hopes that the nation's … [+3122 chars]
